column5: (Updates prices; adds rouble  Petrobras news)     By Bruno Federowski     SAO PAULO  Dec 15 Latin American financial markets sank on Monday as concern over lower oil prices drove investors toward the safe-haven dollar  while Russia's rouble plummeted on the possibility of new U.S. sanctions.
